content.story: My name is Tom. I am 8 years old. I live in a small house with my family. I have a mother, a father, and a sister. My sister's name is Anna. She is 6 years old. We have a dog too. His name is Spot. Spot is black and white. Every morning, I wake up at 7 o'clock. I eat breakfast with my family. Then I go to school. I like school. My favorite subject is math. After school, I play with my friends. We play football in the park. In the evening, I do my homework and watch TV. I go to bed at 9 o'clock.

questions.question: How old is Tom?
questions.explanation: The story says 'I am 8 years old.'

questions.question: What is Tom's sister's name?
questions.explanation: The story says 'My sister's name is Anna.'

questions.question: What color is Spot?
questions.explanation: The story says 'Spot is black and white.'

content.summary: This is a simple story about a boy named Tom, his family, and his daily routine.

content.story: Sarah lives in a big city. She works in a hospital. She is a doctor. Sarah helps sick people get better. She works from Monday to Friday. She starts work at 8 o'clock in the morning. She finishes work at 5 o'clock in the afternoon. On Saturday and Sunday, Sarah doesn't work. She stays at home and reads books. She likes to read about travel. Sarah wants to visit many countries. Last year, she went to Japan. She loved the food and the people. Next year, she wants to go to Italy.

questions.question: What is Sarah's job?
questions.explanation: The story says 'She is a doctor.'

questions.question: When does Sarah work?
questions.explanation: The story says 'She works from Monday to Friday.'

questions.question: What does Sarah like to read about?
questions.explanation: The story says 'She likes to read about travel.'

content.summary: A story about Sarah, a doctor who works in a hospital and enjoys traveling during her free time.

content.story: This is Peter. Peter is a student. He goes to school from Monday to Friday. His school starts at 8:30 in the morning. Peter's favorite subject is science. He likes to learn about animals. After school, Peter does his homework. Then he helps his mother in the kitchen. In the evening, Peter plays with his toys. He has many toy cars. Sometimes, Peter and his father play football in the garden. Peter is happy when he plays football with his father.

questions.question: What is Peter's favorite subject?
questions.explanation: The story says 'Peter's favorite subject is science.'

questions.question: What toys does Peter have?
questions.explanation: The story says 'He has many toy cars.'

questions.question: What sport does Peter play with his father?
questions.explanation: The story says 'Sometimes, Peter and his father play football in the garden.'

content.summary: A story about a boy named Peter, his school life, and activities he does after school.

content.story: Lisa goes to the zoo. She sees many animals. She sees elephants, tigers, and monkeys. Lisa likes the monkeys best. The monkeys jump from tree to tree. They are very funny. Lisa takes photos of the animals with her camera. She eats ice cream at the zoo. It is a hot day. Lisa is happy at the zoo. She wants to come again next week.

questions.question: Where does Lisa go?
questions.explanation: The story says 'Lisa goes to the zoo.'

questions.question: Which animals does Lisa like best?
questions.explanation: The story says 'Lisa likes the monkeys best.'

questions.question: What does Lisa eat at the zoo?
questions.explanation: The story says 'She eats ice cream at the zoo.'

content.summary: A story about a girl named Lisa who visits the zoo and enjoys seeing the animals, especially the monkeys.

content.story: Jack has a small shop. He sells fruits and vegetables. People come to his shop every day. They buy apples, oranges, potatoes, and carrots. Jack opens his shop at 7 in the morning. He closes his shop at 8 in the evening. Jack works hard. On Sunday, the shop is closed. Jack visits his parents on Sunday. His mother makes a nice lunch. Jack likes Sundays.

questions.question: What does Jack sell?
questions.explanation: The story says 'He sells fruits and vegetables.'

questions.question: When does Jack close his shop?
questions.explanation: The story says 'He closes his shop at 8 in the evening.'

questions.question: What day is the shop closed?
questions.explanation: The story says 'On Sunday, the shop is closed.'

content.summary: A story about Jack who owns a small shop selling fruits and vegetables, and visits his parents on Sundays when his shop is closed.

content.story: Mary likes to cook. Today, she makes a cake. First, she puts flour, sugar, and eggs in a bowl. She mixes them well. Then, she puts the mix in the oven. The cake is ready after 30 minutes. It smells very good. Mary's children come home from school. They are happy to eat the cake. Mary is happy too.

questions.question: What does Mary make today?
questions.explanation: The story says 'Today, she makes a cake.'

questions.question: How long does the cake take in the oven?
questions.explanation: The story says 'The cake is ready after 30 minutes.'

questions.question: How do Mary's children feel about the cake?
questions.explanation: The story says 'They are happy to eat the cake.'

content.summary: A story about Mary who bakes a cake for her children to enjoy when they return from school.

content.story: Ben has a new bike. It is red and black. Ben rides his bike to school every day. It takes him 10 minutes to get to school on his bike. One day, it rains. Ben cannot ride his bike. He walks to school. It takes him 30 minutes to walk. Ben is late for school. His teacher is not happy. The next day, the sun shines. Ben rides his bike again. He is happy.

questions.question: What color is Ben's bike?
questions.explanation: The story says 'It is red and black.'

questions.question: Why can't Ben ride his bike one day?
questions.explanation: The story says 'One day, it rains. Ben cannot ride his bike.'

questions.question: How long does it take Ben to walk to school?
questions.explanation: The story says 'It takes him 30 minutes to walk.'

content.summary: A story about a boy named Ben who rides his bike to school but has to walk when it rains, causing him to be late.

content.story: Emma and her family go to the beach. It is a sunny day. Emma builds a sandcastle. Her brother swims in the sea. Her parents sit on chairs and read books. Emma's dog runs on the sand. In the afternoon, they eat lunch. They have sandwiches and fruit. Emma's father buys ice cream for everyone. At 6 o'clock, they go home. It is a good day at the beach.

questions.explanation: The story says 'Emma builds a sandcastle.'

content.story: David is a farmer. He wakes up at 5 o'clock every morning. He has many animals on his farm. He has cows, chickens, and pigs. First, David feeds the animals. Then he collects eggs from the chickens. He gets milk from the cows. David works all day on his farm. In the evening, he is very tired. He goes to bed early. He likes his life on the farm.

questions.explanation: The story says 'In the evening, he is very tired.'

content.story: Jenny is 10 years old. She has a pet fish. The fish's name is Bubble. Bubble lives in a glass bowl. Every morning, Jenny gives food to Bubble. On Monday, Jenny's fish looks sick. It doesn't move much. Jenny is sad. Her mother takes her to the pet shop. They buy medicine for Bubble. Jenny puts the medicine in the water. The next day, Bubble swims around happily. Jenny is very happy.

questions.explanation: The story says 'She has a pet fish.'
